named-query.name: programa.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from ProgramaPlanificacion o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: programa.ejecucion.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from ProgramaEjecucion o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: list.programas.ejecucion
named-query.query: select o from ProgramaEjecucion o where o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: procedimientos.planificacion.by.programa
named-query.query: select o from ProcedimientoPlanificacion o where o.programaPlanificacion.prpId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: procedimientos.ejecucion.by.programa
named-query.query: select o from ProcedimientoEjecucion o where o.programaEjecucion.preId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: memo.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Memorando o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: responsables.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from AuditoriaResponsable o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: usuarios.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Usuario o where o.regActivo=1 and o.institucion.insId=1 and o.usuId not in (select b.usuario.usuId from AuditoriaResponsable b where b.auditoria.audId=1)

named-query.name: find.coordinador.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from AuditoriaResponsable o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.aurRol=0 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: actividades.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Actividad o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1
